name: Xcape
description:
Hi ,the game we make , is maid in Godot , this is  just one level , and still in development , we still need to fix some stuff in the engine , and after will design new levels and will make a story for this project. This is a long term game development , no release date yet. So will appreciate any comment good or bad, helps to develop our game. Thanks and enjoy. This game will be released on android , and pc windows versions. Some of the commands are for touch screen but they can be activated whit mouse as well.

Movements keys: 

  •  LEFT   = Arrow key left
  • RIGHT = Arrow key right
  • JUMP   = Arow key up
  • to fill up life is red ball on right , but can activated whit mouse only.
developers: O L T E A N U
